configuration:
fs.defaultFS <% if @ha != "disabled" -%> hdfs://<%= @nameservice_id %> <% else -%> hdfs://<%= namenode_hosts[0] %>:<%= @hadoop_namenode_port %> <% end -%>
<% if @hdfs_nfs_bridge == "enabled" -%>
hadoop.proxyuser.<%= @hdfs_nfs_bridge_user %>.groups <%= @hdfs_nfs_proxy_groups %>
The '<%= @hdfs_nfs_bridge_user %>' user is allowed to proxy all members of the groups. Note that in most cases you will need to include the group "root" because the user "root" (which usually belonges to "root" group) will generally be the user that initially executes the mount on the NFS client system. Set this to '*' to allow nfsserver user to proxy any group.
hadoop.proxyuser.<%= @hdfs_nfs_bridge_user %>.hosts <%= @hdfs_nfs_gw_host %>
This is the host where the nfs gateway is running. Set this to '*' to allow requests from any hosts to be proxied.
<% end -%>
<% if @ha == "auto" and @zk -%>
ha.zookeeper.quorum <%= @zk %>
<% end -%>
hadoop.security.authentication <%= @hadoop_security_authentication %>
<% if @hadoop_security_authentication == "kerberos" %>
hadoop.security.authorization true
<% end %>
<% if @hadoop_security_group_mapping %>
hadoop.security.group.mapping <%= @hadoop_security_group_mapping %>
<% end %>
<% if @hadoop_core_proxyusers %> <% @hadoop_core_proxyusers.sort.each do |superuser, data| %>
hadoop.proxyuser.<%= superuser %>.hosts <%= data['hosts'] %>
hadoop.proxyuser.<%= superuser %>.groups <%= data['groups'] %>
<% end %>
<% end %> <% if @hadoop_snappy_codec %>
io.compression.codecs org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.GzipCodec,org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.DefaultCodec,org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.BZip2Codec,org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec
<% end %>
<% if @hadoop_config_fs_inmemory_size_mb %>
fs.inmemory.size.mb <%= @hadoop_config_fs_inmemory_size_mb %>
<% end %>
<% if @hadoop_config_io_file_buffer_size %>
io.file.buffer.size <%= @hadoop_config_io_file_buffer_size %>
<% end %>
<% if @hadoop_http_authentication_type == "kerberos" -%>
hadoop.http.filter.initializers org.apache.hadoop.security.AuthenticationFilterInitializer
hadoop.http.authentication.simple.anonymous.allowed false
hadoop.http.authentication.type kerberos
hadoop.http.authentication.kerberos.principal HTTP/_HOST@<%= @kerberos_realm %>
hadoop.http.authentication.kerberos.keytab /etc/HTTP.keytab
hadoop.http.authentication.signature.secret.file <%= @hadoop_http_authentication_signature_secret_file %>
hadoop.http.authentication.cookie.domain <%= @hadoop_http_authentication_cookie_domain %>
<% end -%>
<% if @kms_host %>
hadoop.security.key.provider.path kms://http@<%= @kms_host %>:<%= @kms_port %>/kms
<% end -%>
